description: The project will involve repairing the existing Government Wharf at the Longspur site. The contractor should be able to complete the onsite work in approximately 5-7 weeks from October 15th 2023.
full_summary:
## Invitation to Qualify: Repair of Existing Government Wharf at the Longspur Site, Ontario
### Reference
* **Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) Reference Number**: cb-7827-78440267
* **Number of Amendment**: 2 
* **Invitation Number**: 30004720

### Key Dates
* **Publication Date**: August 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: August 17, 2023, 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time)
* **Amendment Date**: August 17, 2023 

### Project Description
The project involves the repair of the existing Government Wharf at the Longspur site, located at Longspur Lake, Ontario (46°09'47.1"N 81°41'50.3"W). The wharf is situated approximately 13 kilometers south of Espanola, Ontario.

### Scope of Work
It is anticipated that the contractor will complete the repair work within a duration of 5-7 weeks from October 15th, 2023.

### Procurement and Contracting Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Category**: *CNST (Construction)
* **Contracting Entity**: Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)
* **Contracting Entity Address**: 301 Bishop Drive, Fredericton, New Brunswick E3C 2M6, Canada
* **Contact Information**: Marie-France Chrétien, DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca, (450) 521-4448

### Notice and Solicitation
* **Tender Notice PDF**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/7827/30004720---rfq.pdf>
* **Invitation to Qualify**: This is an open tender, conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids have been received by Indigenous businesses who are certified under the Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) criteria and who may be listed in the Government of Canada’s Indigenous Business Directory (Indigenous Business Directory).

### Important Dates

* **Tender Closing Date**: August 17, 2023, 2:00 pm (Eastern Daylight Time)

Please contact Marie-France Chr
